com.wit.and.widget.adapter.internal.module

Interface ISelectable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SelectableItem

    public interface ISelectable

    public interface

    ISelectable

    Interface Overview

    Simple interface for selectable objects. This can be used for list view items for example.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSelected()

      void setSelected(boolean selected)

    • Method Detail

      • setSelected

        void setSelected(boolean selected)

        public void setSelected(boolean selected)

        Changes the selection state of this object.

        Parameters:
        selected - True if the object must be selected otherwise false.

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected()

        public boolean isSelected()

        Checks the selection state of this object.

        Returns:
        True if this object is selected otherwise false.
